result.name: TOMCAT_JVM_FREE_MEMORY
result.description: Tomcat JVM free memory in MB

result.name: TOMCAT_JVM_TOTAL_MEMORY
result.description: Tomcat JVM Total memory used in MB.

result.name: TOMCAT_HTTP_CURRENT_THREAD_COUNT
result.description: Tomcat Http Worker current thread count.

result.name: TOMCAT_HTTP_CURRENT_THREAD_BUSY
result.description: Total Tomcat Http Worker busy threads.

result.name: TOMCAT_HTTP_MAX_PROCESSING_TIME
result.description: Maximum processing time reached for request (ms).

result.name: TOMCAT_HTTP_REQUEST_COUNT
result.description: Total number of requests processed by the Tomcat Http Worker process.

result.name: TOMCAT_HTTP_ERROR_COUNT
result.description: Total number of errors informed by the Tomcat Http Worker process.l

result.name: TOMCAT_HTTP_BYTES_SENT
result.description: Total number of bytes sent by Tomcat from the start of the process.

result.name: TOMCAT_HTTP_BYTES_RECEIVED
result.description: Total number of bytes received by Tomcat from the start of the process.

result.name: TOMCAT_MEMPOOL_HEAP_CMS_OLD_GEN
result.description: CMS Old Gen heap memory pool used percentage

result.name: TOMCAT_MEMPOOL_HEAP_EDEN_SPACE
result.description: Eden Space heap memory pool used percentage

result.name: TOMCAT_MEMPOOL_HEAP_SURVIVOR_SPACE
result.description: Survivor Space heap memory pool used percentage

result.name: TOMCAT_MEMPOOL_NONHEAP_CMS_PERM_GEN
result.description: CMS Perm Gen non-heap memory pool used percentage
